mapper.select: select re.id, re.fecha_ini, re.fecha_fin, r.nombre as r_nombre, r.id_interno as r_id_interno, r.capacidad as r_capacidad, r.estado as r_estado, r.ubicacion as r_ubicacion, tr.tipo as r_tr_tipo, tr.id as r_tr_id, u.nombre as u_nombre, u.id as u_id, u.passw as u_passw, u.tipo as u_tipo, u.carnet as u_carnet, u.carrera as u_carrera from recurso as r left join tipo_recurso as tr on r.id_tipo=tr.id left join reserva as re on r.id_interno=re.id_recurso left join usuario as u on u.id=re.id_usuario where u.id=#{id};

select re.id, re.fecha_ini, re.fecha_fin, r.nombre as r_nombre, r.id_interno as r_id_interno, r.capacidad as r_capacidad, r.estado as r_estado, r.ubicacion as r_ubicacion, tr.tipo as r_tr_tipo, tr.id as r_tr_id, u.nombre as u_nombre, u.id as u_id, u.passw as u_passw, u.tipo as u_tipo, u.carnet as u_carnet, u.carrera as u_carrera from recurso as r left join tipo_recurso as tr on r.id_tipo=tr.id left join reserva as re on r.id_interno=re.id_recurso left join usuario as u on u.id=re.id_usuario where u.id is not null;
